>
[Steadfast Ally](/Feats.aspx?ID=1225) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Shoony" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=296" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 73</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Loyal Empath](/Feats.aspx?ID=1220)

</column>

---

Your presence alone is enough to provide your allies with emotional support. You can use the [Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=75) reaction to grant a bonus to another creature’s Will saving throw even when you haven’t prepared to help.
